headline.main: Henry Russek, 78, a Cardiologist Known for Stress Research, Dies

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Dr. Henry I. Russek, a cardiologist who conducted early studies of the relationship of occupational and emotional stress to heart disease, died on May 30 at Shands Hospital in Gainesville, Fla. He was 78 years old and lived in Boca Raton, Fla.
